To achieve this result we demonstrate a uniform many-to-one embedding of the nodes of a shuffle-exchange network into a linear array. We then give a simple, deterministic routing algorithm on the linear array which schedules the communication of messages necessary to achieve the emulation within the required time bounds. The analysis of the algorithm relies on certain statistical properties of the complex plane diagram of the shuffle-exchange network.
